name: Mac OS X Folder Settings File
summary: A DS_STORE file contains viewing preferences for a folder in macOS (Mac OS X). It stores information about the folder's window location, window size, what view option has been selected (icon, list, or column), and the layout of icons in the window.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

macos.display_name: Mac OS X Finder (not opened manually)
